bug.author: stuaxo
bug.summary: Link in README.android goes to a dead page
bug.description:
README.android <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/tree/master/platforms/android>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/tree/master/platforms/android</denchmark-link>
Points to <denchmark-link:http://opencv.org/platforms/android.html>http://opencv.org/platforms/android.html</denchmark-link>
Which is a 404
